data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.AreaSparklineView.AreaOpacity.Description
data.value: Specifies the opacity (0-255) of the area sparkline.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.BarSparklineViewBase.BarDistance.Description
data.value: Specifies the distance between two bars of a bar sparkline.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.LineSparklineView.EnableAntialiasing.Description
data.value: Gets or sets whether anti-aliasing (smoothing) is applied to the line view.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.LineSparklineView.EndPointMarkerSize.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the size of an end point’s marker.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.LineSparklineView.LineWidth.Description
data.value: Specifies the width of a line in a LineSparklineView.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.LineSparklineView.MarkerColor.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the color to draw line markers.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.LineSparklineView.MarkerSize.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the size of markers for data points in a line sparkline.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.LineSparklineView.MaxPointMarkerSize.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the marker size of a data point that has the maximum value among all data points.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.LineSparklineView.MinPointMarkerSize.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the marker size of a data point that has the minimum value among all data points.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.LineSparklineView.NegativePointMarkerSize.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the marker size of all data points that have negative values (less than 0).

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.LineSparklineView.ShowMarkers.Description
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the visibility of point markers on a sparkline.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.LineSparklineView.StartPointMarkerSize.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the size of a start point’s marker.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineRange.IsAuto.Description
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not range limits should be calculated automatically.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineRange.Limit1.Description
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the first limit of the range.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineRange.Limit2.Description
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the second limit of the range.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.Color.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the color to draw a sparkline.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.EndPointColor.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the color to draw the end point of a sparkline.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.HighlightEndPoint.Description
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether or not to highlight the end point of a sparkline.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.HighlightMaxPoint.Description
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether or not to highlight a sparkline point that has the highest value among all points.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.HighlightMinPoint.Description
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether or not to highlight a sparkline point that has the lowest value among all points.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.HighlightNegativePoints.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the value that specifies whether to highlight the negative points of a sparkline.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.HighlightStartPoint.Description
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether or not to highlight the start point of a sparkline.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.MaxPointColor.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the color to draw a sparkline point that has the highest value among all data points.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.MinPointColor.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the color to draw a sparkline point that has the lowest value among all data points.

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.NegativePointColor.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the color to draw sparkline points that have negative values (less than 0).

data.name: DevExpress.Sparkline.SparklineViewBase.StartPointColor.Description
data.value: Gets or sets the color to draw the start point of a sparkline.
